responses: Hello! How can I help you with Al-Hikmah University today?
Hi there! What information do you need about Al-Hikmah University?
Applicants must have at least five O'level credits including Mathematics and English. Some courses may have additional requirements.
You can find all the courses and programs on the university website. They include programs in Sciences, Arts, and Engineering.

patterns: How do I register for courses?
responses: Course registration is done through the student portal. Make sure your prerequisites and payments are complete.

patterns: How much is the school fees?
responses: Tuition fees vary by program. You can view the detailed fee structure on your student portal.
You can apply for hostel accommodation via the student services section on the portal. Apply early due to limited rooms.
The academic calendar, including semester dates and exam periods, is published on the university website.
Al-Hikmah University offers scholarships for eligible students. Check the student portal for application details.

patterns: How can I reach the university?
responses: You can contact Al-Hikmah University at info@alhikmah.edu.ng or check the website for departmental phone numbers.
